焵字的基本解释

焵
gàng
刃。
煅烧刀刃使坚硬。

焵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gàng］
［《玉篇》古浪切］
(1)锋刃。
(2)煅烧兵器锋刃使坚硬。

焵字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　焵； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页675第11
【玉篇】古浪切，音掆。刀也。【字彙】堅刃也。凡兵器經燒則堅，故今鐵工燒刃曰焵。

焵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
焵字的起名意思

暂无。

焵
Basic explanation of words
焵
gàng
blade.
The calcined blade makes it hard.
焵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gàng］
["Jade Pian" Gu Lang cut]
(1) Sharp edge.
(2) The blades of calcined weapons make them hard.
焵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　焵; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 675 No. 11
[Jade articles] Ancient waves cut, sound cut. Knife too. 【Vocabulary】Strong blade also. All weapons are hardened after being burned, so today the ironworker burns the blade and says 焵.
